21/7

On 21/7, massive people in white-shirts with weapons gathered in area around Yuen Long broke into concourse, platform and trains of station for a nuance-less assault at armorless innocent citizens, resulted in 25 injured patients sent to hospitals.

Demand of legitimate reply for the operations done with admittance of HKPF’s Operation Command Center (行動指揮中心) being formed in Yuen Long at 6pm with acknowledgement of the riot beforehand:
Composition beforehand:
- Lack of advanced patrol force in the areas where riot happened.
- Lack of reaction against a suspected gathering by white-shirted rioters near Fung Yau Street North with weapons.
- Lack of arrangement of sufficient labour in Yuen Long Police Station.
Actions taken during process:
- Reasons of 39 mins late arrival.
- No dispersal of rioters was called in between the attacks.
- Unreachable emergency call towards 999.
- Closure of Police Stations in Yuen Long and Tin Shui Wai.
Arrangement afterwards:
- Poor attitude of HKPF
(e.g. Tsang Ching Fo：It is garuanteed for the determination in HKPF.
Li Hon Man：Didn’t have time for time check on watch.
Yao Nai Keung：We can’t see any aggressive weapons in any party. Only two parties violently attacking each other could be seen.
Lo Wai Chong：The discipline today is the representation of the hard-work by the police force.)
- Lack of immediate arrestment of attackers afterwards
- Claim of no weapon was found inside Nam Pin Wai where rioters were seen to move towards.
- No apology was made after poor arrangement.


27/7

Calling for HK Government’s complete inspection for mis-composition against the riot in Yuen Long on 21July. Citizens were suppressed by force, resulting in 23 traumas.
Operation of dispersal was announced by HKPF:
- Numerous rounds of tear gas shots in residential areas, spread to nearby elderly home, and towards the press without any warning were ignited while one landed on track of an unfounded West-rail line.
- Protesters and press’ helmets were severely damaged by the shots.
- After nightfall, HKPF turned on high beam lights towards the press and the crowd.
- Riot police embarked an attack with bats, pepper balls and tear gas shooting rounds at Yuen - Long West Rail Station against citizens who are peacefully leaving.


28/7

Peaceful protest against shooting incidents in Sheung Wan on 7.21 in Charter Garden. Some participants then marched and stationed in Sai Wan. Protesters were suppressed by force during the late period of the demonstration, causing multiple traumas and 49 protesters were arrested.
- Riot police’s operation escalated rapidly through spraying pepper spray continuously and shooting tear gas rounds along densely populated roads.
- Pepper-water jet pack and pepper balls were shot from footbridge.
- Intense shooting of 20 rounds of tear gas were targeted at crowds within half an hour, numerous rounds of rubber bullets, pepper balls and react rounds.
- Press was targeted with tear gas and high beam lights.
- Ambulance and firefighters were commanded to standby and restricted from entering protest areas.
- 49 youngsters were arrested and declined for bailing request.
- HKPF stated more arrests of protesters will be done in the upcoming days.

21/7

7月21日大量身穿白衣人士手持各式武器於元朗西鐵站一帶聚集並於晚上無差別襲擊市民，並一度擅闖車站大堂、月台及西鐵車廂內對一眾手無寸鐵的無辜市民瘋狂施襲，最終導致25人受傷求醫。

要求香港警察就承認已事先接獲情報並於當晚6時在元朗成立行動揮中心後所作出的以下部署及相應行動作出合理回應：
事前部署：
- 於案發地點一帶未有加強警力巡邏。
- 於白衣人士在鳳攸北街手持武器聚集期間未有作出查問及驅散。
- 未有於區內部署足夠警力應對。
案發期間所採取的行動：
- 事發39分鐘後才到達現場。
- 未有即場驅散或拘捕施襲者。
- 市民未能接通999報案熱線。
- 關閉元朗警署及天水圍警署報案室。
事後跟進行動：
- 未有即場拘捕施襲者。
- 聲稱於南邊圍村內未有發現攻擊性武器。
- 記者會上未有向市民致歉。
- 警方回應差劣：
(e.g. 曾正科：保證警隊有決心，維持香港嘅治安同埋保護市民。
李漢民：沒有時間看錶。
游乃強：任何陣營都不見有攻擊性武器。
盧偉聰：今日的治安係警隊嘅努力。)

27/7

市民自發前往元朗追究7月21日元朗恐襲中警方的部署失當，遭警方武力鎮壓，造成23人受傷。
- 於民居聚集之處多次施放催淚彈，波及鄰近老人院舍，並於沒有警告下直接向記者施放催淚彈，更有一枚催淚彈擊中西鐵架空路軌。
- 示威者及記者頭盔被槍擊並損毀嚴重。
- 警察於入夜後使用強光燈直接射向記者及人群。
- 防暴警察於元朗西鐵站內多次以警棍、胡椒球及催淚彈攻擊正在和平撤離的示威者。

28/7

市民於遮打花園舉行和平集會追究警方7月21日於上環開槍的責任，及後市民自發遊行至西及銅鑼灣，警方於晚上再度武力鎮壓，最終造成多人受傷，49名示威者被捕。
- 部份人士自發前往西環一帶聚集。
- 防暴警察迅速向人群大量並持續施放胡椒噴霧及催淚彈。
- 防暴警察於天橋從上面下向人群施放胡椒水劑及胡椒球。
- 防暴警察多次直接向人群發射多枚橡膠子彈及海綿彈。
- 記者多次被催淚彈擊中及被強光燈持續照射。
- 救護服務及消防服務被禁止於未經警方准許下進入示威範圍救援。
- 49名示者當場被捕，不准保釋並被控以暴動罪。
- 警方聲言會繼續搜捕行動。
